>
[Starfall Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1861)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 22 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 23,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Heavy Rondache](/Shields.aspx?ID=10)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This [high-grade adamantine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=310) [heavy rondache](/Shields.aspx?ID=10) (Hardness 17, HP  100, BT 50) bears a _+3 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [shield boss](/Weapons.aspx?ID=41)_ and has dents that resemble craters on its surface. While wielding the shield, you have fire resistance 15.

**Activate** <actions string="Three Actions" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You Stride up to three times. This movement doesn't trigger reactions and ignores difficult terrain. At the end of your movement, you deal 6d10 bludgeoning damage in a 10-foot emanation and 14d6 fire damage in a 40-foot emanation (DC 40 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save, with the results applying to both the bludgeoning and fire damage). The space where you end your movement and all adjacent spaces become difficult terrain for 1 minute, and the shield glows red-hot for 10 minutes, during which it gains the effect of the [_greater flaming_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=295) property rune.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
